long_description: The soft yet durable REI Sahara shorts are ready to hit the trail. They feature quick-drying fabric and plenty of pocket space for your trail goodies. Breathable, quick-drying nylon offers superb comfort, performance and packability; a Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Zip fly and fixed belt loops; internal elastic and button adjustment at waist personalizes the fit. Crotch gusset ensures good mobility. Pockets include 2 hand, 2 zip thigh and 2 back pockets. REI Sahara shorts feature a comfortable, relaxed fit.
short_description: The soft yet durable REI Sahara shorts are ready to hit the trail. They feature quick-drying fabric and plenty of pocket space for your trail goodies.
